user.about: questions, concerns, requests, or anything else can be sent to my tumblr ask and i'll reply right away. thanks!! (((i change my url a lot so if that link below doesn't work check here.)))

additional_info: i was searching for a butterfly that i could use for my karneval theme and was satisfied with this one. i just figured i'd put it up as an individual style in case someone wanted to use it ^^ looks best on a light background/a layout that's also monochrome imo
